view.animations.unit

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.animations.unit.Sprite

  • public final class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    This utility class is used to get one or more sprites of the game from the sprite-sheet.

    • Method Summary

      This method returns the sprite in the specified position of the sheet.

      • getSprite

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage getSprite(java.awt.Point pointGrid)
        This method returns the sprite in the specified position of the sheet.

        pointGrid - the coordinate to use
        Returns:

      • getSprites

        public static java.util.List<java.awt.image.BufferedImage> getSprites(java.awt.Point... pointGrids)
        This method returns the sprite in the specified position of the sheet.
        Parameters:
        pointGrids - the coordinates where find the sprites
        Returns:
